localization¶

This module contains several Python based implementations for localization. Including a basic Kalman Filter, and base classs for an Extended Kalman Filter and a Particle Filter.

Planned future work includes:

  • completion of the base particle filter

  • A base Unscented Kalman Filter

  • Implementation of a geo-physical particle filter for topographic, magnetic, and gravimetric navigation

Classes

EKFTwoD([x_dim, u_dim, z_dim])

Simple Cartesian plane EKF: x and y position, body frame velocity, heading, angular velocity.

ExtendedKalmanFilter([x_dim, u_dim, z_dim])

Base level class.

KalmanFilter([x_dim, u_dim, z_dim])

A basic Kalman Filter implemented using NumPy.

Particle([state, weight, Map])

A basic particle object for use in a particle filter.

ParticleFilter([n_particles, ...])

This is a base class particle filter that contains many of the re-usable elements common across implementaitons of particle fitlers.
